title: Simulated case-level HAI burden data (Germany) — shayhai_cases
text: Case weights calibrated , summed, reproduce published national estimates German PPS study (2011): total HAIs, attributable deaths, DALYs. Columns: case_id Unique simulated case ID. infection_type Type HAI: "HAP" (healthcare-associated pneumonia), "SSI" (surgical site infection), "BSI" (primary bloodstream infection), "UTI" (urinary tract infection), "CDI" (Clostridioides difficile infection). age_group Age band infection, e.g. "65-74", "75-79", "80-84", "85+"). gender Reported gender ("Female", "Male"). died Indicator (1/0) whether infection estimated result attributable death. yll Years life lost (YLL) assigned case. yld Years lived disability (YLD) assigned case. daly Total disability-adjusted life years case (daly = yll + yld). weight_pop many real-world cases simulated row represents. Summing weight_pop across cases given infection_type yields estimated annual number HAIs type Germany. Interpretation: sum(weight_pop * died) approximates annual number attributable deaths infection type Germany. sum(weight_pop * daly) approximates total DALYs infection type. weighted totals reflect German PPS study (2011).

title: Simulated case-level HAI burden data (EU/EEA, ECDC PPS) — shayhai_cases_ecdc
text: Case weights calibrated , summed, match published ECDC PPS burden estimates per 100,000 population: HAIs, deaths, DALYs. Conceptually, dataset represents illustrative population 100,000 people EU/EEA. Columns: case_id Unique simulated case ID. infection_type Type HAI: "HAP", "SSI", "BSI", "UTI", "CDI". age_group Age band infection. gender Reported gender ("Female", "Male"). died Indicator (1/0) attributable death. yll Years life lost (YLL) case. yld Years lived disability (YLD) case. daly Total disability-adjusted life years (DALY = YLL + YLD). weight_pop many real-world cases (per 100,000 population) simulated row represents. Summing weight_pop across cases one infection type approximates published “HAIs per 100,000” infection type. Similarly, summing weight_pop * died weight_pop * daly approximates deaths per 100,000 DALYs per 100,000, respectively. Interpretation comparison plots: dataset lets directly compare Germany vs EU/EEA Shiny switching shayhai_cases shayhai_cases_ecdc.
